Fireworks aren’t the only thing lighting up July 4—this year, some of America’s top retailers and restaurants are sparking your holiday with sizzling savings and free treats. From backyard‑ready decor discounts to free doughnuts for patriotic wearers, we’ve gathered all the deals that’ll make your celebration fun, flavorful, and budget‑smart. Read on to claim your share of Independence Day freebies and deals—it’s your guide to maximizing the holiday cheer in 2025!

1. Grilling & Home: Wayfair and Target

Wayfair’s Fourth of July sale (June 27–July 6) is dropping prices up to 85% off on furniture, patio sets, rugs, decor, and more—ideal for throwing that backyard bash in style. Meanwhile, Target is offering Joanna Gaines’ Hearth & Hand line starting as low as $2, from melamine dinnerware to outdoor quilts perfect for festive hosting. Whether you’re setting a picnic table or lounging on the patio, now’s the time to score home‑refresh steals.

2. Tech & Kitchen: Amazon’s Long Weekend Sale

Amazon’s Fourth of July sale is delivering up to 80% off, with standout deals like $150 off the new M4 MacBook Air, AirPods, Ninja blenders, and more. Plus, home fans can snag discounts on cast‑iron cookware, air purifiers, and even inflatable pools for those scorching July days. Tech-savvy cooks and entertainment lovers—now’s your moment.

3. Fashion & Swim: Target’s Bikini Blowout

Target is slashing prices on swimwear—6,000+ bikinis and one-pieces starting at just $10, including brands like Shade & Shore and Wild Fable. Need a new swimsuit for the beach or pool while saving? This sale has you covered—literally—in styles from strapless to UPF 50+.

4. Motorized & Outdoor Gear: Multi‑Category Discounts

From Best Buy to Walmart and Home Depot: expect up to 50% off patio gear, grills, tools, and TVs. Pick up a new Weber grill, Samsung TV, or YETI cooler for your celebrations—steep savings mean this is a strategic time to gear up for summer or replace that aging patio set.

5. Playtime & Decor: Wayfair Deep Discounts

Wayfair doesn’t stop at furniture—expect bold markdowns: Adirondack sets now $600 cheaper, storage benches, planters, and accent chairs by Joanna Gaines, Kelly Clarkson, and Martha Stewart’s lines slashed up to 80% off. Stylish summer hosting doesn’t have to break the bank.

6. Food Freebies: Krispy Kreme, Sonic & More

Craving treats? Krispy Kreme is handing out free glazed doughnuts to anyone wearing red, white, and blue on July 4—limit one per guest. Sonic Drive‑In is offering free small shakes with a purchase, while Baskin‑Robbins Rewards members can enjoy $2 off large frozen drinks and $5 off Polar Pizzas all holiday weekend long.

7. Fast Food & Family Meals 4th of July Weekend

Multiple chains are serving sweet deals:

  • Jimmy John’s is offering BOGO wraps from July 3–6.
  • Burger King is giving away a free Whopper with a $1 purchase (July 4–25) and BOGO through DoorDash, July 3–9.
  • Pizza Hut is offering free boneless wings with a $15 DoorDash order.
  • Mountain Mike’s has $10 off two large pizzas using code SUMMER25 (July 2–4).
  • 7‑Eleven/Laredo Taco Company are doing BOGO burritos (July 4–6), plus 7NOW delivery gets $17.76 off $30+ orders on July 4.

8. Family‑Friendly Dining: Red Robin, Fazoli’s, Perkins

  • Red Robin patrons get 20% off $30+ via code 20JULY (July 4–6).
  • Fazoli’s offers a Fresh‑Tossed Family Meal for $15.99 with Fireworks25, plus BOGO Alfredo (July 3–7).
  • Perkins is offering a $9.99 apple pie add-on (June 30–July 4), and free Magnificent Seven breakfast for military dine‑in on July 4.

9. Sweet Treats & Snacks: Carvel, Dairy Queen & TGI Friday’s

Carvel is giving a free Mighty Dynamite Dinosaur cookie topping on ice cream from July 4–6. Dairy Queen serves a $2 Stars & Stripes cupcake pack on July 4. And TGI Friday’s is tempting guests with a celebratory sundae and 25% off online platters (July 4–6) with code 25OffFourth.

10. Military & First‑Responder Perks

Active and retired military: enjoy free national‑park entries via Blue Star Museums, free zoo days (Cincinnati, Columbus) and amusement‑park perks, and generous discounts at Busch Gardens, Disneyland Resorts, and more—all thanks to your service. Perkins is also giving free breakfasts to veterans on July 4.

Independence Day 2025 Deal Summary

This Fourth of July, you’re looking at:

  1. Home upgrades at up to 85% off from Wayfair and Target’s summer collections.
  2. Tech and kitchen steals from Amazon’s up‑to‑80% off bonanza.
  3. Swim‑season wardrobe refreshes at minimal cost.
  4. Patio-perfect outdoor gear marked down at Best Buy/Homedepot.
  5. Free treats and wallet-smart eats at Krispy Kreme, Sonic, and fast‑food chains.
  6. Family meal deals and exclusive discounts for military and service members.

Celebrate Smart, Save Big!

You’ve got the map to this year’s hottest Fourth of July freebies and deals—now go claim them! Whether you’re stocking up for parties, re‑decking the patio, or just satisfying your sweet tooth, there’s something for everyone. Enjoy the celebrations—and the savings.

Independence Day Takeaway

This year’s July 4 deals aren’t just about fireworks—they’re loaded with opportunities to upgrade your home, tech, wardrobe, and meals without emptying your wallet. From mega‑sale furniture to free milkshakes, it’s a holiday loaded with value. Time to fill your cart and fire up those savings!

What’s your favorite deal so far? Have you spotted any other can’t‑miss promotions? Share your finds and comments below!

Amanda Blankenship is a full-time stay-at-home mom. Her family recently welcomed their second child, a baby boy, into the world. She loves writing about various topics, including politics and personal finance. In her spare time, Amanda loves to play with her kids, make food from scratch, crochet, and read.
